row.text: (Archiepiscopis et episcopis per Angliam constitutis) mandat, ut „si qui in fratres Hospitalis Hierosolymitani manus violentas iniecerint, eos publice excom- municatos denuncient“. App. conc. Lat. XIV. 6, Coll. Lips. VII. 8, Coll. Cass. XIX. 7, Coll. Bamb. VII. 6, Comp. I. L. 5. t. 34. c. 13. — „Graviter oculos“.
